channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly-tipping from residents at Great Eastern Buildings, 23rd July
item.description:
The residents from the building across from no.43-45 (Great Eastern Building) are dumping all their rubbish on the other side of the road. There is food waste, garden waste, rubbish sacks etc. Please remove ASAP.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Reading Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Only 1 end of Boevey path is cleaned, 23rd July
item.description:
The st cleaner always misses outside 27, 29, 31, 33 & all the others on that side of Boevey path. The path is split & often confused & all though residents try many are older and struggle with all the leaves & litter blown over from Belvedere sports club . Now they have become over run with foxes which leave a lot of waste
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Boevey Path, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Long Lane, Barnehurst, London

item.title: ‘Sinkhole’, 23rd July
item.description:
I noticed a hole in the asphalt pavement covering - the latter also shows signs of sinking around the hole, approx half a metre or so in diameter. The ‘hole’ is approx 12 inches deep - (see photos) . Location - in front of 34 Bromley Common.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bromley Common, Bromley Common, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Pavement Defect (uneven surface / cracked paving slab)

item.title: Horse box on willow road, 23rd July
item.description:
This horse box has been parked up on willow road for over 3 years (previously reported on numerous ocassions but no action taken to remove) . The box is untaxed and has no number plate . The box is being used for storage and has not moved for many many months . From the pics u can see box is being used for storage and with window open could even pose as a fire hazard. This box is taking up the space for 1.5 cars on a road that is already over run with parking for the station!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willow Road, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Horse Box, 23rd July
item.description:
Has been reported on NUMEROUS occasions. Has not left the road in over 3 years, just moved forward/backwards. Is just used for storage. No number plate on vehicle. Other vehicles have been successfully removed why not this?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willow Road, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin in playground is full, 23rd July
item.description:
The bin in the children's playground on East Dulwich Estate near the Albrighton Community Centre is full of dog poo bags - a health hazard for children. Could this please be emptied?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albrighton Road, East Dulwich, London
